name: TextPathEffects
shortdesc: Options for the alignment and appearance of type on a path.

property.name: RAINBOW_PATH_EFFECT
property.shortdesc: The center of each character's baseline is parallel to the path's tangent. This is the default effect.

property.name: SKEW_PATH_EFFECT
property.shortdesc: The text characters' vertical edges are perfectly vertical regardless of the path shape.

property.name: RIBBON_PATH_EFFECT
property.shortdesc: The text characters' horizontal edges are perfectly horizontal regardless of the path shape.

property.name: STAIR_STEP_PATH_EFFECT
property.shortdesc: The left edge of each character's baseline is on the path and no characters are rotated.

property.name: GRAVITY_PATH_EFFECT
property.shortdesc: The center of each character's baseline is on the path while each vertical edge is in line with the path's center point.
